EmailTemplate.name: Applicant Career Opportunities Inquiry Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} - HR Applicant Career Opportunities Inquiry Case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in a position at Beam Suntory. You will find all of Beam Suntory open positions posted on the www.beamsuntory.com web page under Career Opportunities. If you no longer see a position posted that was previously posted, then that position has been filled. A position could possibly still be showing on a job site that is not on the Beam Suntory site due to the timing the job site completes updates.
Thank You, The Beam Suntory Global Business Services HR Team
